_source.short_desc: SocialSchedules is a free employee scheduling tool for web & mobile. Build your schedule in minutes & send it to your team in a click.
_source.long_desc: SocialSchedules is a free scheduling solution for hourly employees. Build your schedule in minutes, make changes to it easily and send it to your team in a click. Free iOS & Android apps mean you can edit & check the schedule on the go + your employees always have the most updated version. Track time off, forecast sales for more cost effective schedules, integrate with your POS and find replacements fast. Features like group messaging, shift swapping & shift reminders make life easier.
_source.pricing_details:
Basic: Free (up to 10 employees)
Starter: $15.99 mo / location
Premium: $39.99 mo / location
Enterprise: Contact OpenSimSim
_source.target_audience: Cafes, restaurants, retailers, health care, security, hospitality, education facilities and any other business with hourly employees.

related_products.short_desc: With 15+ years in the agile space, Jira offers teams the top tools and best practices to provide the right foundation for growth.
related_products.features: Jira is the #1 software development tool used by agile teams. Teams of 2 to 20,000 rely on Jira to manage every stage of their workflow, from planning to shipping and releasing. With native roadmaps, teams can ladder up their work to track the big picture. Jira's no-code automation engine allows teams to save time and increase power by automating any task or process with a few clicks. And with a free edition, teams up to ten users can leverage all the power of Jira at no cost, forever.

related_products.short_desc: Schedule jobs, coordinate teams, track time and track projects, all in one place.
related_products.features: QuickBooks Time is proudly part of the QuickBooks family, and works alongside leading accounting tools like QuickBooks Online, Xero and MYOB. Schedule jobs, coordinate teams, track time and track projects, all in one place."

related_products.short_desc: Automate your client bookings, cancellations, reminders & payments using the worlds friendliest online scheduling software.
related_products.features: Meet the personal assistant for your schedule (only better) that works 24/7, behind the scenes to fill your calendar and take work off your plate. From the moment clients book with you, Squarespace is there to automatically send branded & customized booking confirmations, deliver text reminders, let clients reschedule on their own, and process payments so your day-to-day runs smoother even as business get busier. All you need to do is show up at the right time.

related_products.short_desc: Employee scheduling software for tracking team availability, evenly allocate tasks and prevent overload, burnouts and missed deadlines.
related_products.features: Clockify is employee and project scheduling software helping you track work hours, create staff work schedules, see everyone's availability, make adjustments when allocating tasks, and control costs and overall budgets. Individual time entries become valuable data about how each day is spent and give you insights on your employees' productivity habits. You can export reports on each working week and customize which data you want to include.

related_products.short_desc: Build custom solutions on monday.com Work OS so you can schedule everything your employees are working on at a glance.
related_products.features: On monday.com Work OS, managers can easily assign tasks and track the progress of any ongoing projects at a glance so they have a real-time source of truth for all of their team's work. Implement the platform's timeline view to schedule your team's work so you never miss a deadline. Finally, generate graphs directly on the platform to visualize how team members allocate time and leverage insights to prioritize more effectively.

related_products.short_desc: Calendly is the world's #1 scheduling tool. It eliminates the hassle of back-and-forth emails and syncs with your entire team.
related_products.features: Calendly makes scheduling meetings easy and efficient, eliminating the hassle of back-and-forth emails so you can get back to work. Already recognized as the intuitive scheduling leader for more than 10 million people around the world, Calendly also offers extended capabilities for teams with powerful collaboration functionality, robust administration controls, and enterprise-grade security and compliance. Integrations with Zoom, Salesforce, Google, Microsoft, Slack, & more.

related_products.short_desc: Wrike is a remote work management software with Gantt charts, performance reports, resource management, and 400+ integrations.
related_products.features: Wrike is a work management software trusted by 20,000+ companies and two million users worldwide. Improve your employee scheduling using resource allocation, custom-built request forms, Kanban boards, Gantt charts, time tracking, performance reports, and workload overviews all in one place. Integrate Wrike with 400+ applications to accelerate your everyday processes. Customize workflows and reduce the need for emails, meetings, status updates, and more. Work smarter, not harder with Wrike.

related_products.short_desc: ClockShark is the leading mobile scheduling & GPS time tracking software for local construction, field service, and contractors.
related_products.features: ClockShark is the leading mobile GPS time tracking and scheduling software built for construction, field service and contractors that want a simpler way to track employee time, run payroll quickly and accurately, and understand job costs. Over 7,000 customers have replaced the hassle of paper timesheets with software that makes it easier to run their business and keeps accountants happy. Dont take our word for it, start a free trial today!

related_products.short_desc: The leading employee scheduling app for agencies, studios and firms. Trusted by brands including Ogilvy, Metalab and Buzzfeed.
related_products.features: Since 2012, Float has been helping the world's top teams including BuzzFeed, Havas and Ogilvy manage their employee and resource schedules. Assign and manage tasks with ease, whilst having a clear, single view of your team's workload. Get live updates of your projects and track resource availability including sick leave, paid time off and public holidays. With drag-and-drop functionality, flexible search and filter features, Float makes scheduling your team simple. Start your 30 day free trial.

related_products.short_desc: The easy way to schedule, track time, attendance, and communicate with workers. Save time. Improve accountability. 14-day free trial.
related_products.features:
When I Work is an easy way for businesses to schedule, track time and attendance, and communicate with their hourly employees. Put the schedule and time clock in every employee's pocket with free iOS and Android apps. Keep track of time off, employee availability, and manage shift swaps with just a few clicks. Integrate with your payroll provider to streamline the process and avoid human error. 
Get started with a 14-day free trial now.

related_products.short_desc: Cloud-based online booking, scheduling, point of sale and marketing software - everything you need to run your spa or salon better.
related_products.features: Tired of spending your days focusing on chasing your employees around and manually writing down schedules? Make life easier for your clients, your staff, and yourself with Bookers employee scheduling software that brings together your online booking, staff scheduling, CRM, point of sale, marketing and retention tools, all on one platform. With Bookers cloud-based software solutions, youll be able to access your business anywhere, anytime. See Booker in action with a free demo!

similar_products.short_desc: The employee scheduling software that keeps things simple. Easily schedule and dispatch remote and non-desk employees.
similar_products.features: Take back your time with an employee scheduler that can foresee scheduling conflicts. Know exactly when employees are free to be scheduled, or open shifts only to chosen staffers. Save what works for you as a template and then duplicate it or customize another set of shifts. With timely notifications employees always know in advance exactly where the week and month will take them. Put a stop to confusion with error-free scheduling supported by attached instructions and an accurate time clock!

similar_products.short_desc: 7shifts is a robust employee scheduling, communication, and time tracking tool built specifically for restaurants. Free for 14 days!
similar_products.features: 7shifts helps restaurants schedule more efficiently with intuitive scheduling, communication, time tracking, and compliance tools. The intuitive drag & drop schedule builder automatically factors in availability, time-off, overtime, and compliance, and managers can easily integrate their POS to ensure they hit their labor targets. With a free app for staff to submit availability requests and swap shifts, building schedules has never been so easy.

similar_products.short_desc: Build custom solutions on monday.com Work OS so you can schedule everything your employees are working on at a glance.

Implement the platform's timeline view to schedule your team's work so you never miss a deadline. Finally, generate graphs directly on the platform to visualize how team members allocate time and leverage insights to prioritize more effectively.

similar_products.short_desc: Easy schedule builder. The team always has their up-to-date schedule. Know who is available to work. Set policies around time-off.
similar_products.features:
Homebase makes work easier for 100,000+ small (but
mighty) businesses with everything they need to
manage and pay an hourly team: employee scheduling, time clocks, payroll, team communication, hiring, onboarding, and compliance. 
 
Just don't call us "Human Capital Management." We're tools built for the busiest businesses, so owners and employees can spend less time on paperwork and more time on what matters. 

Learn more at joinhomebase.com.

similar_products.short_desc: MakeShift makes scheduling, time tracking and communicating with employees a pain free process? And, businesses love it!
similar_products.features:
MakeShift is the go-to employee scheduling solution for companies looking to save time, offer flexibility, increase engagement and drive growth. It lets you build schedules faster, track time & attendance more accurately and communicate with employees in real-time.

Our customers enjoy fewer unfilled shifts, more time to focus on strategy, better work-life balance, happier employees and a healthier bottom line. 

It's PeopleFirst, PainFree scheduling. And businesses love it!

similar_products.short_desc: Imagine posting a schedule, enjoying a restful night's sleep, then waking up with a full schedule and happy staff. Stress Free.
similar_products.features:
Introducing EasyShifts. EasyShifts was created by an RN. We understand how important your job is to the world. Since 2008 we've helped hospitals, nursing homes, assisted living facilities tame their unruly schedules.

You need all your shifts to be filled. Set it and forget it. But, your current scheduling solution (pen/paper or fancy spreadsheet) isn't cutting it. To make matters worse, your team is frustrated too!

Request a personalized demo and see how EasyShifts can work for you.

similar_products.short_desc: Humanity is the leading cloud-based employee scheduling platform that accelerates schedule creation by up to 80 percent.
similar_products.features: Humanity Scheduling, powered by TCP Software, is an easy-to-use and accessible subscription-based employee scheduling solution hosted in the cloud. Organizations can use this tool to effectively create law-compliant and demand-based schedules, automate the scheduling process, manage conflicts, generate reports and more. With Humanity Scheduling, organizations can manage their labor resources in a more efficient manner and save hours from employee scheduling automation.

similar_products.short_desc: Build accurate plans and forecast models that enable scheduling flexibility, even in complex environments.
similar_products.features: With Verint Workforce Management, build accurate plans and forecast models that enable scheduling flexibility, even in complex environments. Create employee schedules to help meet service levels consistently and cost-effectively, while accommodating employee needs for flexibility and telework. Provide a single, unified solution that can be deployed in the cloud or on-premises to help balance customer and employee satisfaction with cost constraints in your contact center.

similar_products.short_desc: Calendly is the world's #1 scheduling tool. It eliminates the hassle of back-and-forth emails and syncs with your entire team.

similar_products.short_desc: TCP's employee scheduling brings together dynamic scheduling capabilities and an intuitive user experience that empowers managers.
similar_products.features: Building and maintaining schedules is a large part of workforce management, which is why our solution has multiple dynamic scheduling features designed to make it as easy as possible. Build a single schedule and apply it to all employees or have individualized schedules throughout. Either way our solution is made to enable any configuration you might need. We offer an array of reports, occurrence features and more to make your operation as easy and efficient as possible.

similar_products.short_desc: Celayix offers the best employee scheduling and time tracking to fit the needs and complexity of today's modern and dynamic workforce.
similar_products.features:
Celayix delivers a powerful best of breed solution as the best employee scheduling, time and attendance, and communications tool for todays modern workforce.

With Celayix you can cut the time it takes create a shift schedule by 95% as well as reduce the costs, effort and headaches of managing your workforce all while seeing immediate benefits of eliminated overtime, reduced turnover, and improved client satisfaction. 

Get started with our 14-day free trial now!

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Scheduling software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Scheduling tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Scheduling software automates the scheduling of events, employees, rooms and other resources. Organizations use these applications to manage the planning of internal and external activities. Typically Scheduling software provides tools such as a shared calendar providing real-time project, task, employee and resource scheduling as well as a variety of forecasting, allocation and resource management features. Often other details, such as resource categorization, location details, timesheet records and employee skill-sets can be edited, updated and managed from the scheduling interface. Scheduling software is related to Employee Scheduling software, Facility Management software and Appointment Scheduling software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Workforce Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Workforce Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Workforce Management software enables organizations to plan, track, and manage the allocation and requirements of labor resources. Workforce Management solutions also help organizations develop and retain top talent. These applications allow businesses to optimize staff scheduling, while reducing labor costs. Workforce Management software is related to Human Resource software, Payroll software, Scheduling software and Time Clock software.

related_products.short_desc: Schedule jobs, coordinate teams, track time and track projects, all in one place.
related_products.features: QuickBooks Time is a proud part of the QuickBooks family, seamlessly connecting with leading accounting tools like QuickBooks Online, ADP and more. Easily manage people, projects and payroll, all in one place

related_products.short_desc: Simply clock in and clock out using a timer, fill timesheets, track attendance, and use data for payroll and billing with Clockify.
related_products.features: Clockify is a time clock software that lets you track time spent on activities. You can create and edit time entries manually, track time by using a stopwatch, and generate personalized reports. Boost your time management skills with an integrated Pomodoro timer - customize it to work for your schedule. There is GPS clocking and location tracking available for remote field teams. Clockify monitors time from anywhere - web, desktop, mobile - all data is synced online.

related_products.short_desc: Leading cloud based time clock software for small and big teams. Easy to use, with great reports, multi-device and offline support.
related_products.features: Leading cloud-based time clock software for small and big teams. Simple, flexible tool for tracking work hours, with multi-platform support. Generates beautiful reports and time usage graphs with an option to export time logs as Excel spreadsheets, get weekly reports via email or share public reports links with clients to provide more transparency. Available as a web app, desktop apps for Windows and Mac, mobile apps for iOS and Android, and a browser extension for Chrome and Firefox.

related_products.short_desc: Time Tracking brings the award-winning BambooHR experience to time entry, approvals and reporting, on the web or the mobile app.
related_products.features: Time Tracking brings the award-winning BambooHR experience to time entry, approvals and reporting, on the web or the mobile app. It makes hours worked easy and accurate for employees to record, and simple and fast for their managers to review and approve. With features such as project tracking and geolocation, Time Tracking helps you maintain a productive and cost effective hourly workforce.

Homebase makes work easier for 100,000+ small (but
mighty) businesses with everything they need to
manage and pay an hourly team: employee scheduling, time clocks, payroll, team communication, hiring, onboarding, and compliance. 
 
Just don't call us "Human Capital Management." We're tools built for the busiest businesses, so owners and employees can spend less time on paperwork and more time on what matters. 

Learn more at joinhomebase.com.

similar_products.short_desc: Time Tracking brings the award-winning BambooHR experience to time entry, approvals and reporting, on the web or the mobile app.
similar_products.features: Time Tracking brings the award-winning BambooHR experience to time entry, approvals and reporting, on the web or the mobile app. It makes hours worked easy and accurate for employees to record, and simple and fast for their managers to review and approve. With features such as project tracking and geolocation, Time Tracking helps you maintain a productive and cost effective hourly workforce.

similar_products.short_desc: Easily track & manage employee work hours with an easy-to-use employee time clock app, designed especially for mobile employees.
similar_products.features: Bring simplicity and accuracy to your employee attendance tracking and work hours management, with GPS location tracking, time off approvals, flexible overtime and breaks preferences, customizable timesheets export, and direct integration with payroll software such as Quickbooks Online & Gusto. Easily track and manage work hours on jobs and projects, schedule jobs, chat with out-of-office employees, share updates & attachments, and so much more in an all-in-one employee management app.

similar_products.short_desc: Cloud based time clock solution that pre-populates reports for payroll. Employees can punch in on their desktop or mobile devices.
similar_products.features: Punching in and out with our time clock software is intuitive for your employees and it's easy for managers to view and export time. Employees can clock in using a browser, iOS or Android app. View who's on the clock, including their GPS position. Advanced features such as PTO Accrual Tracking, Punch Rounding, Job Codes, QR Codes, Automatic Breaks, and SSO are all included in our cloud based time clock solution.

similar_products.short_desc: The easy way to schedule, track time, attendance, and communicate with workers. Save time. Improve accountability. 14-day free trial.
similar_products.features: When I Work is an easy way for businesses to schedule, track time and attendance, and communicate with their hourly employees. Put the schedule and time clock in every employee's pocket with free iOS and Android apps. Keep track of time off, employee availability, and manage shift swaps with just a few clicks. Integrate with your payroll provider to streamline the process and avoid human error. Get started with a 14-day free trial now.

similar_products.short_desc: A touchscreen time clock that can be configured with extensions to meet your exact needs as well as a mobile app for clock operations.
similar_products.features:
We offer multiple device options for employee-facing operations. 
Our industry-leading touchless, biometric and thermal sensor devices provide access control and give your employees the ability to complete self-service functions. Additionally, our MobileClock mobile app allows employees to use their phones as a safe single-user device for all their operations from clocking in/out to inputting requests.

similar_products.short_desc: 7shifts is a robust scheduling, time tracking, and communication tool built specifically for restaurants. Start for free today!
similar_products.features: 7shifts helps restaurants improve efficiency with intuitive scheduling, time tracking, communication, and compliance tools. The intuitive 7punches app integrates right into your schedule to manage time and attendance, reduce compliance risks, and improve employee accountability. The easy drag-and-drop schedule builder automatically factors in availability, time-off, overtime, and compliance, and managers can easily integrate their POS to ensure they hit their labor targets. Start free today!

similar_products.short_desc: uAttend was built for businesses that need an easy-to-use, affordable, and reliable time and attendance system.
similar_products.features: uAttend integrates easy-to-use cloud software with its time clocks to provide businesses efficient, accurate, and streamlined time and attendance tracking. Every uAttend time clock is cloud-connected and supports a variety of punch options including fingerprint, voice control, PIN, RFID, mobile app, and web. Alternatively, the uAttend cloud can be used on its own to provide the same automation without a time clock.

similar_products.short_desc: WebHR is everyone's favorite and a global leader in Cloud HR - Helps you manage the most important asset in your company - your People!
similar_products.features: WebHR is revolutionizing the way HR works. WebHR is a Social all-in-one Cloud based HR Software for Small & Medium Enterprises that handles everything from Hire to Retire, in the most innovate way. WebHR not only saves money to the companies, but also boosts productivity, saves space and make inter and intra-office communications fast, reliable and more efficient. WebHR assists in managing a companys most important asset - its People.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Attendance Tracking software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Attendance Tracking tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Attendance Tracking software helps organizations manage the whereabouts of their employees. These applications track an employee's vacation time off, sick time off, overtime, and absences. The software also searches for patterns in absences. Attendance Tracking software is related to Human Resource software, Payroll software, and Time Clock software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Employee Scheduling software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Employee Scheduling tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Employee Scheduling software helps businesses organize and manage personnel's schedules. Employee Scheduling solutions often show work schedules of different employees side by side to allow managers to easily match tasks to people with the appropriate skill level. This software also allows employees to have real-time access to their and their colleagues' schedules, make changes to the system straight from the scheduling interface, and keep scheduling process up to date with the most current information. Employee Scheduling software is related to Appointment Scheduling software, Scheduling software and Workforce Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Human Resource software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Human Resource tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Human Resource software, also known as a Human Resources Information System (HRIS) or Human Resources Management System (HRMS), enables an organization to manage employee records and information. Human Resource Management software allows you to organize contact details, department, attendance, salary, training, benefits and more. Many Human Resource Management systems and resource management software also interface with applicant tracking and payroll software. Human Resource Management software is related to Applicant Tracking software, Payroll software, Performance Appraisal software and Workforce Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Leave Management systems on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Leave Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Leave Management System allows organizations to manage employee time-off, setup leave policies, and automate leave requests approval.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Payroll software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Payroll tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Payroll software automates the management of employees' salaries, wages, bonuses and deductions. Time off, vacation accrual, benefits and retirement accounts can also be tracked by a Payroll software system. These applications allow businesses to keep the payroll process in-house. Payroll software can be standalone, but often integrates with an organization's accounting software. Payroll software Human Resource software, Time Clock software and Workforce Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Time Tracking software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Time Tracking tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Time Tracking software automates the tracking of billable hours. Time Tracking solutions can be used by organizations in professional services industries to monitor projects on a task and overall basis as well as billing rates so that the appropriate amount may be invoiced. Time Tracking software is related to Professional Services Automation software, Project Management software, Time Clock software and Workforce Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Workforce Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Workforce Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Workforce Management software enables organizations to plan, track, and manage the allocation and requirements of labor resources. Workforce Management solutions also help organizations develop and retain top talent. These applications allow businesses to optimize staff scheduling, while reducing labor costs. Workforce Management software is related to Human Resource software, Payroll software, Scheduling software and Time Clock software.
